paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant D18G, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Interestingly, however, a disease-related mutation (D18G) of TTR destabilizes the polypeptides and exposes a cryptic N-glycosylation site.

functional_data.summary: The D18G mutation destabilizes TTR and exposes a cryptic N-glycosylation site.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with familial amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation facilitates the clearance of mutant TTR by bringing the protein to the ER-associated degradation (ERAD) machinery.
key_quotes: Interestingly, however, a disease-related mutation (D18G) of TTR destabilizes the polypeptides and exposes a cryptic N-glycosylation site.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the TTR variant.
